title: Joy And Joan, Joy Et Joan 1985 Brigitte Lahaie, Isabelle Solar, Pierre Londiche, Jean Marc Maurel, Ian Patrick, Elodie De Vry, Beatrice Tronchon, Sofie Vianey, Maria Isabel Lopez, + Jacques Rene Saurel

sources.title: Joy And Joan Joy Et Joan 1985 Brigitte Lahaie Isabelle Solar Pierre Londiche Jea
sources.description: Brigitte Lahaie in one of those travelogue movies that is "inspired" by Emmanuelle. Starts off with a modeling session in English before switching to French for the remainder of the movie which is set in Thailand.Â  Could not find subtitles, though they may not have helped much.
